message:
Hey guys :)
I try to import a dynamic located .py file. In plugins/<name>/config.py (<name> is the name of a plugin) I have a dictionary called config_dic = {..}. Now I want to use this dictionary and I tried this: my_config = __import__("plugins."+plugin+".config").config_dic but this does not work (No module named plugins.default.config)
self solved... I had to place __init__.py files in each subfolder. Didn't know that python need those to recognize a folder as a package :)
it's also available as a backport for older versions
